name: DEPRECATED_AIA_QR_getClassificationModelVersionDetails
description: Expression rule to get Classification Model Latest Published Version for Given Model Id
sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordType_v1"(
  recordType: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version,
  fields: ri!fields,
  filters: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    filters: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelId,
        operator: "=",
        value: ri!modelId
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.modelVersionId,
        operator: "=",
        value: ri!modelVersionId
      ),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AIA Classification Model Version.status,
        operator: "=",
        value: ri!status
      )
    },
    ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
).data
